name: Farm Wars Wild West - Tap Attack Evil Plants & Shoot War for iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch
name_original: Farm Wars Wild West - Tap Attack Evil Plants & Shoot War for iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch
description:
Beware the vegetables have come alive!They have mutated into vicious veggies and taken all farmers hostage. Farmer Joe is trying to escape the attacking veggies and save his fellow farmer hostages. Armed with a revolver, it’s a veggie shootout challenge!


+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
* TOP GAMES APP OF 2013
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
CHECK THE SCREENSHOTS AND SEE FOR YOURSELF!

Will you be able to help Farmer Joe escape the vicious veggies and survive???

It’s not just about shooting for survival! Along the way you will need to collect medical supplies to stay healthy, bags of money to upgrade weapons, and also save your fellow farmers.

FEATURES:
- Various shooting weapons available for upgrade
- 12 fun and challenging levels with three levels of difficulty
- Contains 6 characters, and 18 different vegetable mutant species

Download Farmers vs. Plants: Veggie Edition today for a shootout of survival!
